channel.title: Infrastructure on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: What's your preferred development infrastructure stack?
item.description: In Response to Matt Raible's question about my preferred development stack. Source control In my own development project I switched to Git some time ago. I was using svn and before that cvs for a couple of years. Git just makes it easy to try out small ideas very quickly without reverting the code. We will introduce Git at work pretty soon (I hope). The Atlassian cloud I was using Confluence as a Wiki in my open source project and my current employer Hypoport uses it as well.
